PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12722010-10-21,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act (Surface Coating Materials)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE I TO THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (Surface Coating Materials) in order to align Canada with the United States in respect of total lead levels in surface coating materials and certain products with surface coating materials applied to them by lowering the total lead limit from 600 mg/kg to 90 mg/kg in surface coating materials applied to furniture and other articles for children, toys, equipment and other products for use by a child in learning or play and pencils and artists' brushes under Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0225 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
